SchemaActionOutline.description: A detailed description of a python function containing type annotations, a function signature, and pseudocode for the function body

content.description:
The python function for performing the desired task. 
                          This should always contain a keyword argument called `role` of type `Role` that defaults to None.
content.title: Content

SchemaActionOutline.title: SchemaActionOutline

description: A autonomous agent capable of carrying out actions according to input and output schema

name.description: The agent's name. It should refer to the agents desired function
name.title: Name

profile.description: The agent's profile. It should give a brief description of the agent's desired function. This will be used as input to an LLM model
profile.title: Profile

goal.description: The agent's goal. This will be used as input to an LLM model
goal.title: Goal

title: SchemaAgentOutline
